data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Stad Utrecht cruise from Banjouwangie to Amsterdam started at 1849-02-19
Ship: Stad Utrecht, Voyage: Banjouwangie - Amsterdam, 1st Observer: F.H.J. Taski (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
